# Government Tender Announcement

## Instrumental Recombination Cell System for Exploratory Oil and Gas Purposes

### Solicitation Number
WS4067140377-Doc4224799763

### Tender Description
The Department of Natural Resources (NRCan) is seeking to procure an Instrumented Recombination Cell System to facilitate the mixing of two-phase oil/gas samples into a single-phase at high pressure. This system will enable high-pressure experiments on oil and gas samples.

### Key Features and Requirements:

- The system shall comprise an instrumented recombination cell with a hydraulic piston to enable mixing of high-pressure oil and gas samples.
- The mixing system shall be designed for high-pressure operation (up to 15,000 psi).
- The system shall be capable of achieving a homogenous mixture of two-phase oil/gas samples.
- The system shall be equipped with necessary safety features and controls to ensure safe operation.

### Tender Details

- **Solicitation Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Tender Status:** The tender is now closed.
- **Tender Closing Date:** October 11, 2023, 14:00:00 local time.
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** October 31, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date:** August 13, 2024

### Contact Information

- **Contact Person:** Stephanie Way, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Email Address:** [stephanie.way@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stephanie.way@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Trade Agreements:** This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

### Delivery Region
